title.narrative: LAND TENURE PROJECT

description.narrative: Burkina Faso - LAND TENURE PROJECT: This project aims to increase rural productivity and investment in land through legal and procedural changes; community outreach; institutional development and capacity building for land services delivery; and land tenure interventions in selected communes.
